title: Add lowering replay/automation enforcement (CI/Automation Enforcement) (issue #2362 / task M19-C010)

mode_matrix.name: debug-o0

invariant checks are explicit and fail closed when evidence does not satisfy documented contracts
fixture/manifest evidence parity remains stable for issue-closeout replay

M19C010_validate_invariants returns deterministic drift codes for call-shape, cleanup, or metadata failures
